title: Cant play Any Draft pick game modes
body: Hi guys, When i go to play Lol it launches up and everything just fine, but when i go to play with friends i cant do any draft pick game modes. It just goes to a black screen and says Arranging teams..... But if i do normal Summoners rift or ARAM or anything else it launches just fine, does anyone have a solution to this or is it just me?

replies.body: This black screen usually indicates a connection problem that's failing to download assets as well as transition you over to the same server or group.  I recommend going over each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to fix this up.  Let me know if you have any questions!
